actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to clarify that individuals evicted from assisted housing because of drug-related criminal activity are ineligible for preferential treatment.
short_title: Fairness in Federal Housing Admissions Act of 1989

summary.text: Fairness in Federal Housing Admissions Act of 1989 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to make a person or family evicted from public or assisted housing because of drug-related criminal activity ineligible for specified housing preferences.

titles.title: Fairness in Federal Housing Admissions Act of 1989
A bill to clarify that individuals evicted from assisted housing because of drug-related criminal activity are ineligible for preferential treatment.
